        Gift Basket. Boy gives a Gift Basket to girl when committed, Girl receives a Gift Basket when committed.

    • Method Detail

      • getHpns

        public double getHpns()
        Getter for Happiness. Happiness of geek boys is given by the intelligence of their girlfriend alone.
        Returns:
        Happiness of Geek boy

      • fillBasket

        public void fillBasket(essentialGift[] esGifts,
                       utilityGift[] uGifts,
                       luxuryGift[] lGifts)
        Method for setting Gift Basket. Geeks gift their girlfriend with enough gifts, equal or just over the maintenance cost. They additionally give one luxury gift, if budget allows.
        Parameters:
        esGifts - Essential gift list
        uGifts - Utility gift list
        lGifts - Luxury gift list
